name: Bts.ai Bitshares explorer market activity
description: This little style removes spacing from Bts.ai market page so that it fits into full screen without scrolling. And adds some colors for identifying bots and human traders.
additional_info:
v0.1
- First alpha release
- 17 possible bot names + *bot* matching
- fixed sizes of main blocks (have not tested on other screen sizes)
- TODO: auto refresh checkbox needs a better styling
v0.1.1
- added relative height
v0.1.2
- added more bots
- added BTS whales or users that have more than 1 million BTS
v0.1.3
- added more users
- switched to screen height value
